project01.title: For The Love of Java
project01.description: This app allows a user to find a coffee shop that matches their needs best.

project1.title: Temperature Converter
project1.description: This app converts temperatures in Fahrenheit to Celsius, or will convert temperatures in Celsius to Fahrenheit
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Jurassic Park
project2.description: This app was a group project that provides the user with an application to assist in managing park activities
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, Sass, Bootstrap, ES6 Modules, jQuery, Cron Job, Firebase Console, Version Control with Github

project4.title: Pinterest
project4.description: This app is my personal version of the very popular Pinterest site. Users can sign in and create their own boards and pins
project4.technologiesUsed: HTML, Sass, Bootstrap, ES6 Modules, jQuery, Firebase Console, Version Control with Github

project5.title: Tamagotchi
project5.description: This app will take you back to the 90s when everyone had to have a tamagotchi.  This app allows the user to attempt to keep a virtual pet alive.  Good luck!
project5.technologiesUsed: HTML, Bootstrap, ES6 Modules, jQuery, Firebase Console, Version Control with Github
